mapper.select: select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_number = #{pro_number}

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'A%' order by pro_paycount desc

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'B%' order by pro_paycount desc

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'C%' order by pro_paycount desc

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'A0%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'A1%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'A2%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'B0%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'B1%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'C0%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'C1%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'D0%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'D1%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'D2%'

select pro_number, pro_categoryserial, pro_name, pro_maindesc,pro_maindesctitle,pro_subdesc ,pro_option1,pro_option2,pro_option3,pro_paycount, pro_bucketcount ,pro_price,pro_soldout,pro_img1,pro_img2,pro_img3,pro_img4,pro_img5 from product where pro_categoryserial like 'D3%'
